com.munger.passwordkeeper.alert

Interface InputFragment.Listener

  • Enclosing class:
    InputFragment

    public static interface InputFragment.Listener
    Use this interface to handle okay and cancel events from this popup.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      This is called when cancel is clicked.
      boolean okay(java.lang.String inputText)
      This is called when okay is clicked with the text currently in the input.

    • Method Detail

      • okay

        boolean okay(java.lang.String inputText)
        This is called when okay is clicked with the text currently in the input.
        Parameters:
        inputText - the final text the user input.
        Returns:
        return true if you want the dialog to close, false if you want it to stay open.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        This is called when cancel is clicked.
